title: project title
description: GLUT, which is bundled with OpenGL, allows us to create operating system windows and to register user interface callbacks. This basic functionality is sufficient for our purposes. If we wanted a more full-featured library for window management and user interaction, we would consider using a full windowing toolkit like GTK or Qt
